segments.text: I see the boy balancing on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so determined to get those cookies, even if it means risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is watching him, her hand out, ready to catch one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re working together, and it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, but she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the kids are so focused on their little mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip, but the boy doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s excitement is almost palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is full of life and energy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR
